English.Char_Desc_2000:
Features in Time Clock Free
Time Clock Free is a fully featured web based time clock
We have all the features of a standard time clock, plus many more.
Most Important
100% Web Based - No installs, Free upgrades, works with Windows & Apple Employees can clock in/out from any computer or smart phone - You can limit where they clock in and clock out with password protection We have the best features at the lowest cost
General Time Clock Features
Automatic Payroll Calculation Employees can clock in/out from assigned computers Multilingual support - custom prompts No training involved & highly customizable Manager & employee user levels Unlimited employees Low Cost - Plans starting at $0 / month No messy software installations Export data to excel or PDF Free lifetime upgrades - automatic No hardware required - No initial investment 100% internet based Security Works with all computers - PC, Mac, Linux Any time pay periods No contract - cancel anytime Free support & upgrades- you will never pay for support or upgrades
Security:
128 Bit SSL encryption Sensitive information encrypted at database level Data is automatically backed up nightly
Reliability
Built on Adobe Flex and PHP development platform MySQL database Hosted In a world class data center
Reporting / Exporting
Export to MS Excel file Export to PDF file
Free for small business:
If you do not need Reports/Camera you will never need to pay anything.
